lines.text: Well, it's about time that someone appreciated a woman. England will never be great until she's had a queen or two.

[after throwing an arrow into a list of four names]
Three to go! Three black arrows for three black hearts!
I don't enjoy indoor archery especially with myself as a possible target.

[Disarmed by Shelton and at his mercy]
Have it done,lad! There'a one thing I can still teach yuh, and that's how to die.
